content: free pdf pattern with the instructions for knitting the torfhús by jigsknits hat torfhús is a simple hat matching with the pullover under the same name an easy project for beginners and a way of using your léttlopi leftovers the pattern is knitted with léttlopi 50 gr balls ~ approx 100 m turquoise & light grey s/m m/l a 1404 glacier blue 2 2 b 0054 ash 1 1 beige & green s/m m/l a 1418 straw 2 2 b 1405 bottle green 1 1 black petrol & orange s/m m/l a 1707 galaxy 2 2 b 1704 apricot 1 1 black petrol & orange s/m m/l a 1702 milkyway 2 2 b 1403 lapis blue 1 1 _________ sizes s/m m/l circumference without stretching 44cm 48cm length with pompom 28cm 28cm gauge léttlopi 10 × 10cm = 22 sts and 23 row in st st on 4mm needles knitting chart 1 knit bottom-up
